featured.text: One way to get an appealing portrait of a cat or dog is to hold a biscuit or treat above the camera.

definition.zh_def: 肖像，特別是指一幅畫或照片，描繪一個人的面部特徵。
definition.en_def: A painting, drawing, or photograph of a person, especially one depicting the face.
definition.example: The artist created a stunning portrait of the young woman.
